org.apache.ctakes.ytex.kernel.dao

Interface ConceptDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConceptDaoImpl

    public interface ConceptDao
    create/retrieve concept graphs. store concept graph on file system as they can get big (>10MB). This is not a problem for sql server/oracle, but may require increasing the max_packet_size on mysql.
    Author:
    vijay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createConceptGraph(String dir, String name, String query, boolean checkCycle, Set<String> forbiddenConcepts)
      create the concept graph with specified name using specified query.
      ConceptGraph getConceptGraph(String name)
      retrieve an existing concept graph.

    • Method Detail

      • getConceptGraph

        ConceptGraph getConceptGraph(String name)
        retrieve an existing concept graph. This attempts to find the concept graph as follows:
        • classpath: attempt to load org/apache/ctakes/ytex/conceptGraph/[name].gz
        • relative to org.apache.ctakes.ytex.conceptGraphDir: if that fails then relative to the directory defined by the system property/ytex property org.apache.ctakes.ytex.conceptGraphDir
        • relative to ytex.properties: if the org...conceptGraphDir property is not defined, then look for [directory of ytex.properties]/conceptGraph/[name].gz
        Parameters:
        name - name of concept graph. Will retrieve from classpath/file system. @see #createConceptGraph
        Returns:

      • createConceptGraph

        void createConceptGraph(String dir,
                        String name,
                        String query,
                        boolean checkCycle,
                        Set<String> forbiddenConcepts)
                 throws IOException
        create the concept graph with specified name using specified query. Will create a file [name].gz under dir.
        Parameters:
        dir - directory of concept graph (optional). If null will use directory specified by the system property/ytex property org.apache.ctakes.ytex.conceptGraphDir. If the property is not defined, use [directory of ytex.properties]/conceptGraph
        name - name of concept graph
        query - returns 2 string columns, 1st column is the child concept, 2nd column is the parent concept.
        checkCycle - if true will check for cycles and remove them (default true). If this is set to false, then only pagerank can be used on this graph.
        forbiddenConcepts - set of concepts whose edges will not be added to the concept graph (optional). By default, this includes umls concepts like C1274012 (Ambiguous concept).
        Throws:
        IOException
